title.narrative: Supporting Technical and Vocational Education and Training in China's advanced manufacturing and logistics industries

description.narrative: This pilot project is designed to draw on UK expertise to support China in improving Technical and Vocational Education and Training in the advanced manufacturing and logistics industries. Working jointly with key Chinese stakeholders such as the National Reform and Development Commission and the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, and engaging practitioners in the Chinese Technical and Vocational Education and Training industry, this project will lay the groundwork for, and inform the design of, the multi-year Prosperity Fund Skills programme, part of the China Prosperity Portfolio. This programme will lead to a more skilled and productive workforce helping China's ongoing transition to an inclusive, sustainable and productive economy. It will also generate opportunities for international business in the Skills and Education sectors, bringing potential benefits to British companies in sectors where they are well placed to compete.
